SEARCH
Module JNewton
Package crab.newton

Class NewtonMaterial

java.lang.Object
crab.newton.NewtonMaterial
public class NewtonMaterial extends Object
NewtonMaterial relies on preview features of the Java platform:
  • NewtonMaterial refers to one or more preview APIs: MemorySegment.
Programs can only use NewtonMaterial when preview features are enabled.
Preview features may be removed in a future release, or upgraded to permanent features of the Java platform.
